style: font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.56%;top: 2.59%;width: 19.79%;height: 9.98%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 20%;font-weight: bold;

text:
ごめんね
エイフェン
残りは
１人で
読める?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 61.65%;top: 7.31%;width: 12.02%;height: 13.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.93%;top: 23.90%;width: 6.91%;height: 7.08%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
招集の終わりに
ついてです、
あなたのお子さんは…
すみませんが…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.05%;top: 39.47%;width: 17.45%;height: 11.24%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 20%;

text:
招集で
起こったことを
何も覚えて
いないでしょう。
恐ろしいと
お思いでしょう…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 35.37%;top: 39.62%;width: 14.57%;height: 13.60%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 20%;

font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 64.63%;top: 37.34%;width: 8.09%;height: 9.83%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
ママ
手紙は全部は
読まないよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.61%;top: 74.45%;width: 10.74%;height: 16.43%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
それでいいわ
問題ないわよ
